definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]

sentences.english: How can you distinguish pseudomyopia and true sex myopia?
sentences.chinese: 怎样能分清假性近视和真性近视？

sentences.english: Can be pseudomyopia treated with eyedrop ?
sentences.chinese: 假性近视可以用眼药水治吗？

sentences.english: People who do an excessive amount of near vision work may experience a false or "pseudo" myopia.
sentences.chinese: 过度的近距离用眼工作会使人患有假性近视。

sentences.english: It appears that he has pseudomyopia.
sentences.chinese: 结果显示他是假性近视。

sentences.english: Does teenage pseudomyopia follow play computer to concern?
sentences.chinese: 青少年假性近视跟玩电脑有关吗？

sentences.english: What does pseudomyopia have to differ with myopia?
sentences.chinese: 假性近视跟近视有什么不同？

sentences.english: It says that it's just pseudomyopia, so my son's sight can be corrected.
sentences.chinese: 报告说只是假性近视，所以我儿子的视力可以被矫正。

sentences.english: Did adolescent get pseudomyopia how correctional?
sentences.chinese: 青少年得了假性近视怎样矫正？

sentences.english: What method can make pseudomyopia regains normal level?
sentences.chinese: 有什么办法可以使假性近视恢复到正常水平？

sentences.english: How can pseudomyopia reply the most quickly?
sentences.chinese: 假性近视怎样可以最快回复？

definition: dry eye/xerophthalmia (drying of the tear glands, often due to lack of vitamin A)
eye floaters (moving spots in the eye's vitreous humor)
